=== What ===

With another great release comes many great parties, and they are all over Florida! Please join us to celebrate the release of Ubuntu 9.10 (Karmic) in a city near you.

Read more about <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/KarmicReleaseParties|Release Parties]]</nowiki> or view a list of all <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/KarmicReleaseParties#Confirmed%20Parties|Confirmed Parties]]</nowiki>.

=== Who ===

Everyone is invited to attend. That means you can bring family, friends, imaginary friends and even pets (actually, you should check with your local party on that last one).

If there is no party near you, then form one! 

=== Where & When ===

Release Parties are being hosted all over Florida. Find the closest one to you and show up (or you could just show up to all of them).

==== Lakeland ====

'''Date''': Nov 7th

'''Time''': 4:00PM UTC-5

'''Where''': Mike & Michelle Hall's Home, 1213 Walt Williams Rd
Lakeland, FL 33809 (<nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geocode=&q=1213+Walt+Williams+Rd+Lakeland,+FL+33809&sll=28.553154,-81.364438&sspn=0.85523,1.234589&ie=UTF8&z=17&iwloc=A|Map]]</nowiki>)

'''What''': We will also be celebrating the LoCo's Birthday (<nowiki>[[http://www.meetup.com/Tampa-Linux/calendar/10712190/|More Info]]</nowiki>)

'''What to bring''': Please bring a covered dish if you can manage it... we're covering the meat, some sides, dessert & drinks. We'll provide 'adult' beverages, as well, within reason (and budget!), so you might wanna BYOB, as well.

'''Team Contact''': <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:mhall119]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:michelle-qimo4kids]]</nowiki>

Please <nowiki>[[http://www.meetup.com/Tampa-Linux/calendar/10712190/|RSVP]]</nowiki> at the Meetup.com page if you plan to attend.
